response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its unique features and the dedication of our team. Considering its significance, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $920,000. This is an opportunity not only to own a piece of unparalleled quality but also to benefit from a substantial discount. We believe this price offers a fair balance between our investment and your valuation, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 920000}
